sys_hub_flow.description: This step introduces an approval workflow that ensures only verified visitor entries are accepted into the system. When a visitor submits a check-in request with a Pending status, the assigned host (employee) receives an approval request. Based on the host’s decision, the visitor's status is automatically updated to Approved or Rejected. This adds a layer of security and control, preventing unauthorized or unreviewed access.
